chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (a b : Term A n) (nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b) (p q r : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM r -> divP A A0 eqA multA divA n a b -> eqP A eqA n (spminusf a b nZb (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q) r) (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (spminusf a b nZb p r) q)

Premises:
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
eqP : forall A : Set, (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop
canonical : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
CoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
divP : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop

minuspf : forall A : Set, A -> A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), (forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n)

eqp_spminusf_com : forall (a b c : Term A n) (nZc : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) c) (p q r : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM r -> eqP A eqA n p q -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> divP A A0 eqA multA divA n a c -> eqP A eqA n (spminusf a c nZc p r) (spminusf b c nZc q r)

canonical_spminusf : forall (a b : Term A n) (nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b) (p q : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q -> divP A A0 eqA multA divA n a b -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (spminusf a b nZb p q)

canonical_spminusf_full_t : forall (a b : Term A n) (nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b) (p q : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) -> divP A A0 eqA multA divA n a b -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (spminusf a b nZb p q))

```coq
intros a b nZb p q r Hcan_p Hcan_q Hcan_r Hdiv.
rewrite <- spminusf_minuspf with (a:=a) (b:=b) (nZb:=nZb) (p:=p) (q:=q) (r:=r).
apply eqp_trans with (spminusf a b nZb (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q) r).
apply spminusf_pluspf_com with (a:=a) (b:=b) (nZb:=nZb) (p:=p) (q:=q) (r:=r).
apply Hcan_p.
apply Hcan_q.
apply Hcan_r.
apply Hdiv.
apply eqp_refl.
Qed.

original: intros a b nZb p q r Hcan_p Hcan_q Hcan_r Hdiv. rewrite <- spminusf_minuspf with (a:=a) (b:=b) (nZb:=nZb) (p:=p) (q:=q) (r:=r). apply eqp_trans with (spminusf a b nZb (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q) r). apply spminusf_pluspf_com with (a:=a) (b:=b) (nZb:=nZb) (p:=p) (q:=q) (r:=r). apply Hcan_p. apply Hcan_q. apply Hcan_r. apply Hdiv. apply eqp_refl.
